title: Upload image-9.png and use it as the GreenPlantz logo (header, footer, favicon)

requirements.text: Add the uploaded image (image-9.png) to frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/, and create a cache-busted, header-optimized transparent PNG logo derived from it at exactly 112px height (preserve aspect ratio; no distortion; no extra padding unless needed to avoid clipping).
acceptanceCriteria: The repository contains the original uploaded file under frontend/public/assets/generated/ (image-9.png).
A new derived logo PNG exists under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with a cache-busting filename and 112px height, transparent background preserved where applicable.
The derived logo PNG renders correctly when loaded directly via /assets/generated/<filename>.

requirements.text: Update the site header logo image to use the newly generated cache-busted logo asset (replace the current src "/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-untitled-design.dim_112x112.cb_20260209.png" in frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx).
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo remains responsive and does not overflow the header height (header container is h-16), maintaining aspect ratio.

requirements.text: Update the website footer brand logo to use the newly generated cache-busted logo asset (replace the current src "/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-untitled-design.dim_112x112.cb_20260209.png" in frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFooter.tsx).
acceptanceCriteria: The footer brand logo displays correctly on mobile and desktop layouts.

requirements.text: Generate new favicon assets derived from the uploaded image-9.png (16x16 PNG, 32x32 PNG, and .ico) with cache-busting filenames under frontend/public/assets/generated/, and update frontend/index.html to reference the new favicon filenames (replacing the current favicon.cb_20260209.ico, favicon-32x32.cb_20260209.png, favicon-16x16.cb_20260209.png).
acceptanceCriteria: New favicon files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and are referenced in frontend/index.html.
A hard refresh shows the updated favicon in the browser tab (no broken favicon requests in the network panel).

requirements.text: Search the frontend codebase for any remaining references to the previous logo asset path "/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-untitled-design.dim_112x112.cb_20260209.png" (and any other older GreenPlantz logo assets under /assets/generated/) and update them to the newly generated cache-busted logo asset so the new logo is used everywhere it appears.
acceptanceCriteria: No references remain to "/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-untitled-design.dim_112x112.cb_20260209.png" in the frontend source after the change.
All brand-logo instances in the UI use the new cache-busted asset path(s).

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not serve generated images from the backend; keep them as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Changing backend logic or data models.
Adding new pages or changing navigation beyond updating logo/favicons.
Implementing image uploading by users at runtime (this request is for static asset inclusion).

required: Header-optimized transparent logo derived from image-9.png at exactly 112px height (greenplantz-logo-image-9.dim_auto_x112.cb_20260209_XX.png)
